title: Sandbox

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Choose which faction to join at day (only usable D1).

> Give yourself a new ability or attribute at day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Day 1, you must choose a faction to join. Any Neutral Killing roles count as their own faction, and you can win with them if you are on their faction. You will join any factional chats. If you pick a faction that would make you on your own, you get the lone member of a faction bonus.

> Any ability/attribute you give yourself does not take effect until the start of the night.

> You may multitask.

fields.name: Restrictions for abilities/attributes:
fields.value:
> No giving yourself any sort of permanent defense.

> No execution immunity.

> No overkill attacks or invincible+ defense.

> No conversion.

fields.name: > No game breaking abilities or attributes (up to host in the end, but some examples include:
fields.value: kill everyone, convert everyone, gain infinite uses of your abilities, etc.) (Strong abilities/attributes are ok, it's up to host to decide how strong it can be.)

fields.name: Extra restrictions for good faction (Applies if Sandbox chooses to join town or a good alternative like City):
fields.value:
> No learning exact roles.

> No kill above basic.

> No giving protection above powerful.

> No giving yourself defense (unless it is temporary through an ability.)

> No abilities that reveal you are good to the town.

~~sorry in advance for whenever someone gets this and finds a loophole and breaks the game~~
